column4: what commands do i use to reinsttall drivers without a internet connection
I dont know what drivers i have -> It used to work perfectly, with no errors, now it does not
i think my video card is nvideo
i have rebooted several times - i only just found out about this service
it happened about 2 days ago
AMD radion HD 4890 does that mean anything to you
its a desktop PC
i have two PCs: on with windows XP which i am using to chat with you, another with ubuntu that i want to sort out
and the desktop PC with ubumtu does not have internet access
i have managed to get to a command line, and i thought that another user may be able to tell me what to type into it to sort it out
well the good thing is it's a desktop so maybe just move the disk to a system that has access and install fix it there?
atheros is one of the best supported wifi suprized it won't work
wifi encypted?   try wicd if you didn't already
well if your the admin of the network you might want to temp decrypt the network till things work
if the wire works then stick with that,  conectivity is important to help get things to work
you stated the wire works?  so plug it in?
sure you can reinstall with a live cd , just move your /home/* to  a usb and recover later
if you spend more than 2 hours trying to fix many times faster to just reinstall if the install isn't what broke it to start
ya sometime when you remember to plug the power plug into the wall does it for me
I failed to read you having any graphic problems but this time of night I miss many things
with a reinstall?  you should delete any partitions you plan to use to install or ubuntu will be clueless what you want to use
